availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Caldwell County, Kentucky, farmer. Tennessee native. Married to Elvira Featherston. Father of Nancy Featherston, Missouri Featherston, Belfield Featherstone, Hiram Featherston, and George Featherson. Farmer in Shelby County, Illinois, in 1850. Farmer in Princeton, Kentucky, in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Illinois, Shelby County, Becks Creek, p. 155B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, Princeton, p. 40.
Tenth Manuscript Census of the United States (1880), Population Schedules, Missouri, St. Francis County, Marion Township, p. 439A.
